mapper.select: SELECT `id` as id, `appId` as appId, `accessToken` as accessToken, `createTime` as createTime, `modifyTime` as modifyTime FROM `app_info`
SELECT `id` as id, `appId` as appId, `accessToken` as accessToken, `createTime` as createTime, `modifyTime` as modifyTime FROM `app_info` ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
